title: GeoSIRR: Geological Section Interpretation, Reconstruction & Refinement
description: GeoSIRR (Geological Section Interpretation, Reconstruction & Refinement) is an open-source Python Framework that leverages large language models (LLMs) to translate free-form geological narratives into structured, coordinate-based cross-section geometries.
